On steel as a medium, he said: What it can do in arriving at form economically, no other material can do. The metal itself possesses little art history. What associations it possesses are those of this century: power, structure, movement, progress, suspension, destruction and brutality. Eric Schmidt acted as a mentor to Larry Page during his tenure. He also clashed with the co-founder, according to Ken Auletta , author of "Googled: The End of the World as We Know It." They went through a very tough management patch, Ken Auletta said.
